content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery

SELECT 
TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE--,
    --FIELD_TERMINATOR = ''
) AS results;


SELECT 
TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t'
) AS results;


EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT 
TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''trip_type.tsv'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
    FORMAT = ''CSV'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ''\t''
) AS results';


SELECT 
MAX(LEN(trip_type)),
MAX(LEN(trip_type_desc))
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t'
) AS results;


SELECT 
TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_type.tsv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '\t'
) WITH (
    trip_type TINYINT,
    trip_type_desc VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS results;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT 
TOP 100 * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''trip_type.tsv'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
    FORMAT = ''CSV'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ''\t''
) WITH (
    trip_type TINYINT,
    trip_type_desc VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS results';
